Title: Volga - Volga
Writer: Grigoriy Aleksandrov, Nikolay Erdman, Vladimir Nilsen, Mikhail Volpin (additional poetry)
Actors: Igor Ilyinsky, Vladimir Volodin, Pavel Olenev, Sergei Antimonov
Plot: Widely claimed to be Joseph Stalin's favorite movie, this classic musical comedy is a must-see. The action takes place on a steamboat on the iconic Volga River, as two groups of performers travel to Moscow to perform in the Moscow Musical Olympiad.
